article:
Births
* 446 BC ** Aristophanes, Greek playwright (approximate date) (d. c. 386 BC)
  ** Marcus Furius Camillus, Roman soldier and statesman (traditional date)
  (d. c. 365 BC)

Deaths
* 449 BC ** Appius Claudius, former decemvir, suicide ** Spurius Oppius, former
  decemvir, suicide
* 443 BC – Pindar, Greek poet (b. c. 522 BC)
* 442 BC – Zhou zhen ding wang, King of the Zhou Dynasty of China

References
